title: What Kind of Treatment Is This? - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Empires   European Ambience   Fallen Nobility   Female Protagonist   Goddesses   Handsome Male Lead   Male Yandere   Nobles   R-18   Reincarnated in a Game World   Reverse Harem   Tsundere
author: 유채
description:
I was just playing R-19 games as usual.

But I suddenly woke up in the game world as Sasha, the protagonist of the reverse harem game, who has the mystical power to heal wounds or diseases.

But does she fix it with magic? Or make a potion or something? Of course not! She is a character who heals with her body!

I have to break the quest to get out of the game.

How do I increase the likelihood of this guy’s strategy game?

“It’s a sensitive body. I like it.”

(She trembles in fear and sheds tears.)

(I feel in pleasure.)◀

No! I haven’t felt it! I haven’t even picked it!

What Kind of Treatment Is This?>
